ModMetaData.name: Rimstation 13 - The Quest For Spess
ModMetaData.author: Bendigeidfran
ModMetaData.description: 0.18 adds a whole host of quality of life changes and fixes as well as singularities! As of 0.17 Rimstation 13 requires Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 to run. Rimstation 13 is intended to be a complete overhaul for RimWorld and is recommended that you load it as soon as possible after Humanoid Alien Races. Rimstation 13 works best with no other mods enabled.
